20110105140337.000|20110105140341.000|CC1|BROTHER JACKIE AND SISTER       
20110105140341.000|20110105140343.000|CC1|LaTOYA IN ATTENDANCE.           
20110105140343.000|20110105140347.000|CC1|THEY HAD NO COMMENT.            
20110105140347.000|20110105140350.000|CC1|A FORMER BODYGUARD SAID WHEN    
20110105140350.000|20110105140352.000|CC1|JACKSON WAS UNCONSCIOUS, DR.    
20110105140352.000|20110105140353.000|CC1|MURRAY DIDN'T SEEM TO KNOW HOW  
20110105140353.000|20110105140357.000|CC1|TO DO CPR AND ASKED IF ANYONE   
20110105140357.000|20110105140401.000|CC1|HOW KNEW HOW TO DO IT.

20110105140404.000|20110105140405.000|CC1|MINUTES BEFORE CALLING 911 AND  
20110105140405.000|20110105140409.000|CC1|FAIL TO MENTION HE GAVE         
20110105140409.000|20110105140410.000|CC1|PROPOFOL, WHICH MEDICAL         
20110105140410.000|20110105140411.000|CC1|EXAMINERS SAID LED TO MICHAEL   
20110105140411.000|20110105140412.000|CC1|JACKSON'S DEATH SO THREE        
20110105140412.000|20110105140414.000|CC1|WITNESSES TOOK THE STAND        
20110105140414.000|20110105140415.000|CC1|YESTERDAY.                      
20110105140415.000|20110105140417.000|CC1|30 WITNESSES IN TOTAL EXPECT TO 
20110105140417.000|20110105140419.000|CC1|TESTIFY IN THE PRELIMINARY

20110105140429.000|20110105140431.000|CC1|>>> GROWING CREDIT CARD FRAUD   
20110105140431.000|20110105140432.000|CC1|SCANDAL LEADS TO THE CLOSURE OF 
20110105140432.000|20110105140433.000|CC1|A SMALL GAS STATION -- I THINK  
20110105140433.000|20110105140435.000|CC1|THE OWNERS OF THE GAS STATION   
20110105140435.000|20110105140438.000|CC1|SORT OF PICKED UP AND RAN.      
20110105140438.000|20110105140443.000|CC1|GINA SILVA IS AT SIERRA MADRE   
20110105140443.000|20110105140444.000|CC1|WITH THE STORY.                 
20110105140444.000|20110105140445.000|CC1|>> Reporter:  SO MANY VICTIMS,  
20110105140445.000|20110105140447.000|CC1|IT'S SUCH A VIOLATION.          
20110105140447.000|20110105140448.000|CC1|YOU COME IN TO AGAVES STATION   
20110105140448.000|20110105140450.000|CC1|AND PUT IN YOUR CREDIT CARD AND 
20110105140450.000|20110105140452.000|CC1|YOU REALLY DON'T EXPECT THERE   
20110105140452.000|20110105140454.000|CC1|ARE GOING TO BE ANY PROBLEMS    
20110105140454.000|20110105140455.000|CC1|BUT IN THIS  CASE, SKIMMERS     
20110105140455.000|20110105140456.000|CC1|WERE INSTALLED.                 
20110105140456.000|20110105140458.000|CC1|WHEN PEOPLE STOPPED TO BUY AND  
20110105140458.000|20110105140503.000|CC1|PUT IN THEIR CREDIT CARD,,, THE 
20110105140503.000|20110105140503.000|CC1|NUMBERS WERE STOLEN.            
20110105140503.000|20110105140505.000|CC1|SO FAR THE AMOUNT IS $62,000    
20110105140505.000|20110105140507.000|CC1|AND POLICE EXPECT MORE VICTIMS  
20110105140507.000|20110105140508.000|CC1|TO COME FORWARD WHEN THEY GET   
20110105140508.000|20110105140509.000|CC1|THEIR STATEMENTS.               
20110105140509.000|20110105140511.000|CC1|POLICE SHUT DOWN THE EVG        
20110105140511.000|20110105140514.000|CC1|QUALITY GAS STATION AT 50 SOUTH 
20110105140514.000|20110105140516.000|CC1|BALDWIN AVENUE IN SIERRA MADRE. 
20110105140516.000|20110105140518.000|CC1|IT WAS VERY BUSY AND HAD THE    
20110105140518.000|20110105140519.000|CC1|CHEAPEST GAS IN THE AREA.       
20110105140519.000|20110105140521.000|CC1|THIS FRAUD IS NOT UNUSUAL AND   
20110105140521.000|20110105140523.000|CC1|HAPPENS QUITE OFTEN.            
20110105140523.000|20110105140524.000|CC1|THIEVES INSTALL SPECIAL         
20110105140524.000|20110105140524.000|CC1|EQUIPMENT WITHOUT ANYONE        
20110105140524.000|20110105140526.000|CC1|NOTICING  AND CAN EVEN STEAL    
20110105140526.000|20110105140527.000|CC1|YOUR INFORMATION FROM ACROSS    
20110105140527.000|20110105140528.000|CC1|THE STREET.                     
20110105140528.000|20110105140529.000|CC1|EVEN THOUGH POLICE SAID THE     
20110105140529.000|20110105140530.000|CC1|EMPLOYEES ARE NOT SUSPECT IN    
20110105140530.000|20110105140532.000|CC1|THIS FRAUD, SOME VICTIMS ARE    
20110105140532.000|20110105140533.000|CC1|SUSPICIOUS BECAUSE THE GAS      
20110105140533.000|20110105140535.000|CC1|STATION REFUSE TO TAKE CASH,    
20110105140535.000|20110105140536.000|CC1|ONLY CREDIT OR DEBIT.           
20110105140536.000|20110105140537.000|CC1|POLICE HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO    
20110105140537.000|20110105140539.000|CC1|TALK TO THE OWNER.              
20110105140539.000|20110105140540.000|CC1|THEY ARE CALLING HIM A PERSON   
20110105140540.000|20110105140541.000|CC1|OF INTEREST.                    
20110105140541.000|20110105140543.000|CC1|DETECTIVES SUGGEST YOU CHECK    
20110105140543.000|20110105140544.000|CC1|YOUR BANK STATEMENTS FOR ANY    
20110105140544.000|20110105140546.000|CC1|CHARGES YOU DIDN'T MAKE AND     
20110105140546.000|20110105140547.000|CC1|ALWAYS TRY TO USE A CREDIT CARD 
20110105140547.000|20110105140548.000|CC1|INSTEAD OF A DEBIT CARD.        
20110105140548.000|20110105140550.000|CC1|YOU CERTAINLY DON'T WANT        
20110105140550.000|20110105140551.000|CC1|SOMEONE TO EMPTY YOUR CHECKING  
20110105140551.000|20110105140552.000|CC1|ACCOUNT.                        
20110105140552.000|20110105140555.000|CC1|SO FAR THE LOSSES AMOUNT TO     
20110105140555.000|20110105140557.000|CC1|$62,000 AND  AGAIN, DETECTIVES  
20110105140557.000|20110105140559.000|CC1|ARE GETTING A LOT MORE  CALLS.  
20110105140559.000|20110105140559.000|CC1|THEY'RE LOOKING INSIDE SO IF    
20110105140559.000|20110105140607.000|CC1|YOU BELIEVE YOU HAVE BEEN A     
20110105140607.000|20110105140609.000|CC1|VICTIM SUSPECT YOU HAVE BEEN,   
20110105140609.000|20110105140610.000|CC1|CALL THE POLICE.
